練習に励む日々は早いもので……\n最初の試験の日を迎えた。機動性能評価試験だ。:
I've been practicing so fast...
It's the day of the first test. The Mobility Performance Test.
あれからトレブルクインテットの皆は、\nなんとかＶＲＸをものにすることができたの:
Ever since then, everyone in Treburg-Intedt had been...

いよいよ本番です～！\nここが運命の分かれ道、これまでの努力が試されるときです！:
It's finally time for the real thing!
This is the crossroads of fate. It's time to test our efforts!
トレブルクインテットの行く末はどうなってしまうんでしょうか！\nこの後、３０分後:
I wonder what the future holds for Treburg-Intette!
We'll be broadcasting live in 30 minutes! Don't miss it!!
今のはどこで使う動画なんだ？: Where did you use that video?
ライブ配信前の告知Ｔｗｅｅｔｙに載せる動画だね。\n拡散したいからチームと個別、:

I want it to spread, so I'm going to use both the team and the individual account.
フルートもお疲れ様だな……開始前までこんな告知に協力させられて。: Thanks for all your hard work, Flute... You made me help with this announcement just before it started.
お気遣いあざまるです～！ でも大丈夫です！\nここで勝てればいいんですから！ 皆:
Thank you for your concern! But I'm fine!
We just need to win here! Are you all ready?
お久しぶりですね！\n今日は本番、対よろです！:
Long time no see!
Today's the big day! Let's fight!
言っておくが、私たちは手加減はしない。\nそのつもりで、覚悟しておけ。:
Just so you know, we're not going easy on you.
That's what I'm going to do. Prepare yourself.
ええ、分かってますよ！\nフルートたちもマックスアゲアゲで負けません！:
Yes, I know!
The flutes won't lose to Max Ageha, either!
……フッ、それでいい。そのほうが張り合いがあるからな。: ...Heh, that's fine. It's more competitive that way.
両チーム揃っているようですね。それでは本日の、\n機動性能評価試験の概要について:
Looks like both teams are here. Well then, today's...
I'll explain the outline of the Mobility Performance Test again.
本試験は規定コースのクリアタイムを競う形式です。\n用意されたチェックポイントを:
This exam is a form of competing for the specified course's completion time.
Please pass through all the checkpoints prepared.
実戦を想定し『立ち上がり加速』『急旋回』『反復加減速』といった、\n項目が評価で:
With real combat in mind, there were things like "stand up and accelerate," "sharp turn," and "repeat and decelerate"
The course is set up so that items can be evaluated.
ふん、結果を出すだけだ。: Hmph. I'm just going to get results.
テストが始まると、トレブルクインテットのメンバーは巧みに機体を\n操り、次々にチ:
When the test began, the members of the Treburg Integrity skillfully maneuvered the aircraft
I manipulated them, passing checkpoint after checkpoint.
ＶＲＸを従わせる――そんな俺からの抽象的な指示を、\n彼女たちは今まさに目の前で:
I'll make VRX obey me—that's the abstract instruction I'm giving her
The girls were materializing right in front of me.
力強く、しなやかな彼女たちの機動にＲＳ社の担当者はもちろん、\n集まっていた報道:
The powerful, supple girls' maneuvers made the people in charge of the RS Company, of course
Loud cheers erupted from the assembled reporters as well.
（ライブ配信のコメントも盛り上がっている……！\nそれだけみんなの技量に視聴者が:
(The comments on the live broadcast are getting excited, too...!

あとは最後の直線よ！: All that's left is the last straight line!
一気に駆け抜ける……！: I dash through it all at once...!
５人がゴールした瞬間、表示されるタイム。\nそれはこれまでの自分たちが持つ記録を:
The moment the five of us reach the goal, the time displayed.
That was a huge change in the record they had made so far.
うんうん、しっかり成果に繋げられたね。: Yep, yep. That was a solid result.
よくやった、みんな。これで目標に一歩前進だな。: Well done, everyone. Now we're one step closer to our goal.
あとはトリニティ・ジュエルがどこまで食らいついてくるか……ね。: All that's left is to figure out how much Trinity Jewel will eat...right?
いよいよ、レイヴェルたちトリニティ・ジュエルの出番だ。\n彼女たちの乗る機体はフ:
Finally, it was time for Ravel and the other Trinity Jewels to make their move.
The aircraft they were riding was different from the Frontier.
その後パスファインダー各機はスタートを切り、\n特に問題なく最初のチェックポイン:
After that, each of the Pathfinders took off
We passed the first checkpoint without any problems.
だが、ラップタイムを確認すると大きく遅れている。: However, when I checked the rap time, I found myself greatly delayed.
彼女たちが使うＡＨＤジェネレーターは立ち上がりが鈍い。\nこれは想定内だろう。多:
The ASD generator they were using was slow to stand up.
This is probably within expectations. Probably...
そうだね。この後からの加速力はかなりのものだろうから――: That's right. I'm sure the acceleration after this will be considerable, so――
予想通りに急加速をするトリニティ・ジュエルの機体。\nやはりＡＨＤの推進力は桁違:
Trinity Jewel's machine accelerated as fast as I'd expected.
The ASD's propulsion really is on a whole other level. The crowd is excited by its intensity.
でもあのスピードを維持したまま旋回はできない。\nパワー重視のＡＨＤは小刻みな加:
But I can't turn while maintaining that speed.
Power-focused ASD shouldn't be good at decelerating little by little...
あんなスピードで突っ込んだらチェックポイントを通り過ぎて――: If he charged at that speed, he'd pass the checkpoint—
俺達が目をみはった瞬間、トリニティ・ジュエルのＭＧが急旋回する。\nさらなる轟音:
The moment we opened our eyes, Trinity Jewel's MG made a sharp turn.
With an even louder roar...!
いや、機体が描く軌道はほぼ直角に近いものだ。\nこれはもはや『旋回』という表現は:
No, the trajectory the aircraft draws is close to a right angle.
It might not be appropriate to call this a "turn" anymore.
スラスターによる強引な軌道変化――\nスラスターステアとでもいうべき技術だ……！:
Forceful orbital changes caused by thrusters—
It's a technique you could call thruster stair...!
あそこを見て。方向を変えるときにスラスターが転回してる。: Look over there. The thrusters are rolling around when I change direction.
普通、動き出したら慣性の法則で、推力を切っても前進する。\nその力は推力に比例す:
Normally, when you start moving, you use the law of inertia to move forward even if you turn off the thrust.
That power is proportional to thrust, so you have to decelerate when you turn, or you won't be able to turn completely.
だけど……あれは推力方向を一瞬で変えることで、\n強引に出力でねじ伏せて方向転換:
But... by changing the direction of the thrust in an instant,
I'm forcibly twisting it down with my output and changing direction.
それってＭＧからすれば横っ腹を殴られたようなものじゃない？\nなんであんな風に曲:
Isn't that like a punch to the side from MG?
How can she bend like that...?
それがパイロットの腕、ってことだろうね。: That must be the pilot's skill.
高出力を最適運用する――まさに職人芸だ。ＡＨＤを活かすなら\nこの手しかないが…:
Using high output to the best of my ability—a true work of art. If I wanted to make use of the ASD, I could do it.
This is our only option, but... I didn't think we'd be able to go this far.
（正直、ここまでとは思わなかった……！ まさか高出力の特性を\n活かして、それを:

...Ahem.

もちろんです！ 勝負は始まったばかりです！: Of course! The match has only just begun!
ふっ、そうか……まあ、これくらいで折れてもらっては、\n盛り上がりに欠けるからな:

その程度の『心持ち』で、本気で私達に勝つ気でいるなら、\nこの先もお前達は単にＲ:

言わないとわからないのか？ お前達にはかける想いがない。浅い。\n根底がない。必:

There was no foundation. No desperation. No goal, no wish, no obsession, no passion.
そうか？ 少なくとも私にはその場限りの感情しか見えないが。\n例えば『なんか客寄:

私は違う。今のこの一瞬一瞬の活動が、私だけじゃない色んな人たちの\n未来のために:
I'm different. This fleeting moment of activity is not just for me, but for all sorts of people.
It's for the future. Modeling isn't a game. That's part of it.
だから私は負けない……いや、負けられない。\n特に、ふわっと場当たり的な感情で生:
That's why I won't lose... No, I can't.
Especially those who live on the spur of the moment.
